item.title: Is it Possible? | Password Protecting A Folder
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

You can use winzip to password protect the files within a folder. Just make a new .zip folder put your porn in it. then put passwords on them. And change the names and make the icon some sort of windows icon (properties>change icon) and make it a read only and hidden folder. And in windows explorer (if enabled) go to tools>folder options And set windows explorer not to see hidden folders.

Read full topic
